name: Ski Trip (Vaguely Damp Games, Rhoka, mudtruck, ewulff)
name_original: Ski Trip (Vaguely Damp Games, Rhoka, mudtruck, ewulff)
description:
Take the ski trip of your life into the absurd. Hit the slopes and sync deeper and deeper into the sound, the forest, and your mind. Crank up the volume, and watch as everything around you seems to align with the beat. It's not just a game, it's an audio visual experience.

Post Jam Version 1.1:

Fixed some invisible colliders

Ensured all collectibles are collectible.

All original music by:

Chris Meese: https://open.spotify.com/artist/2GrVwYaYUCe6SmiInOJQxN

Dylan Satterfield: https://broodmachina.bandcamp.com/

Controls:

Keyboard

- A to turn Left - D to turn Right - S/Ctrl/Space to Crouch - Esc to Pause

Gamepad Control Supported as well

Credits:

Eli Wulff - Programming

Chris Meese - Programming, SFX, Soundtrack

Hayden Yeagley - 3D Art

Matthew Rom - 3D Art

Dylan Satterfield - Soundtrack

Kyle Bieganek - Design

Shane Finnegan - 2D Art

Post Jam version contains a few minor QOL fixes:

-Fixed a few misaligned and invisible colliders

-Fixed the position of a few collectibles that were impossible to collect

-Fixed respawn point of a checkpoint to be more forgiving

Please feel free to download and rate 1.0 for LD!
